subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4552 is on the way
description_text:
Hi,

Is there any info about this order as tracking number is showing quite 
confusing information :(
This package still hevn't been delivered to me.


Best Regards
Irek

conversations.body_text:
Hi,

https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8689?follow=email doesn't 
show enything.


Best Regards
Ireneusz Pelech

If I don't get any real updates on my order I will have to contact my 
creadit card company and report fraud.

In attachment, there is resolts of tracking package which said that 
shipment has been returned

Best Regards
Ireneusz Pelech
Hi Irek Pelech,  We have reshipped a new package to you, Here is your new tracking number: 1ZJ455510405908308.   The shipping carrier is UPS, you can track it via https://www.ups.com/track)
